article_title: Londonderry wants special meeting to OK union contract
article_text:
North Andover, MA (01845)

Today

Mostly cloudy...isolated thunderstorms developing this afternoon. High near 85F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Ray Carbone rcarbone@eagletribune.com

og.description: LONDONDERRY – Town Council voted unanimously this week to ask the Rockingham Country Superior Court for permission to hold a special town meeting this fall to consider a new four-year
